__e: You want to fuck me like Israel fucked my country?
Yet Israel found a king in David.
How much blood does Israel need to stop this?
The main thing is that he found someone to take him shopping. Isn't that why he came to Israel?
Now you think Israel is your mother.
She told me a strange story about you wanting to move to Israel and live on a kibbutz.
Although it would be very difficult to go to Israel and not see anyone at all.
This isn't a camp, this is Israel, and our street is the best.
May there be abundant peace from heaven... and light upon us and upon all Israel. And say Amen.
